feed.title: FORM Consulting
feed.subtitle: Shorter description of FORM Consulting needed here.

entry.title: Noelia Ortiz
entry.content: My name is Noelia Ortiz and I am a sophomore at Pennsylvania State University. I am studying Political Science, African Studies, and Women's Studies and I am super excited to be a part of F.O.R.M Consulting this year! To tell you a little bit about myself, I am Colombian and French and I danced ballet and played the violin for too many years! Applying to college was a really stressful process for me, and I wish I would have had a mentor to help me through the tips and tricks that wasn't my parent or my college counselor. Today, applying to college is very complex. There is a lot of insider information and tools that not everyone knows, so having been through the process myself, I really wanted to provide that insider information to others.

entry.title: Tatiana Klett
entry.content: Hi! My name is Tatiana. Iâ€™m a sophomore majoring in Industrial Engineering with a minor in African American Studies. I was born and raised in the city of Pittsburgh. I enjoy skiing, reading, and traveling in my free time.

entry.title: Molly Burns
entry.content: My name is Molly Burns. I am a junior Political Science major and Women's Studies minor. My hometown is Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania. I joined FORM to help students get into the school of their dreams and get their future off to a great start.

entry.title: Kelly Weaver
entry.content: Hi! My name is Kelly Weaver, and I'm a junior education major specializing in English. I also have minors in Spanish and ESL. I'm from Scranton, PA (yes, like The Office). My hobbies include playing piano, reading, and binge-watching reality TV. I'm super excited to help you achieve your goals and ease some of your college application stress!

entry.title: John Paul Barce
entry.content: Hi, my name is John Paul Barce and I am a sophomore majoring in biology with a minor in marine science. I am from Darien, Connecticut. I love literally every sport and follow them avidly; I am currently learning to SCUBA dive and I like to be active!

entry.title: Hayden Long
entry.content: Hi everyone, my name is Hayden Long and I am a freshman in industrial engineering. I am from Elkins, WV but I am proud to call Penn State my new home. My favorite Penn State memory so far is coming to Penn State games as a little kid (especially the White-Outs).

entry.title: Hannah Marsho
entry.content: Hi, my name is Hannah Marsho and I am a sophomore majoring in Economics and Finance at Penn State! I am from West Chester, PA. This year, I joined F.O.R.M. to help mentor high school students through the college admissions process. My younger sister is applying to colleges this year and in seeing her struggle with writing her essays and navigating the applications and deadlines, I was reminded of the hectic and life-changing process. I want to be able to answer any questions and allay any fears students may have and help them to feel confident about their college applications.

entry.title: Em Evans
entry.content: Hi! My name is Em Evans and I'm a sophomore from Yardley, Pennsylvania studying Mechanical Engineering and Spanish. In addition to being a F.O.R.M. mentor, I am an alto saxophone player in the Penn State Marching Blue Band and an undergraduate researcher in the Technology and Human Research in Engineering Design Lab. As Education Chair, I lead mentor training through educational seminars and workshops. I also develop our reference materials and keep them up to date.

entry.title: Cory Steinle
entry.content: Majors: Communication Arts & Sciences (B.S.) and Labor and Employment Relations (B.S.) Minors: English, History, Business & the Liberal Arts Hometown: Beaver Falls, PA Favorite Penn State Memory: I thoroughly enjoyed a recent production of Polaroid Stories at the Centre Stage in downtown State College. The show was a modern take on greco-roman mythologies, as played by homeless youth. I felt that the show did an incredible job illustrating the human side of people who are suffering.

entry.title: Brandon Szwalbenest
entry.content: My name is Brandon Szwalbenest, and I am from Yardley, Pennsylvania. Here at Penn State I am majoring in Finance and Economics, but I am not as boring as that sounds! Some of my interests include watching and playing all sports, and consuming an abundance of film and TV. (My personal favorites are football, Ghostbusters, and Game of Thrones) I signed up to be a FORM mentor because I am genuinely interested in giving back to young people in need of assistance (even if those people are just one year my junior).
